channel.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip
channel.description: Get a short, powerful, and easy to understand fitness tip every weekday that will help you to get the most out of your healthy lifestyle! The Free Tips cover exercise, nutrition, supplementation, myths vs. facts, and more!
channel.copyright: Unless otherwise stated, all information contained in podcasts originated at Fitness Destinations are the sole property of the owners and managers of the Fitness Destinations website.
channel.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
channel.itunes:summary: Get a short, powerful, and easy to understand fitness tip every weekday that will help you to get the most out of your healthy lifestyle! The Free Tips cover exercise, nutrition, supplementation, myths vs. facts, and more!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Get a short, powerful, and easy to understand fitness tip every weekday!

item.title: Fitness Destinations Fitness Podcast - January 14, 2006
item.description: Leave the gym behind! Are you one of those people who will only workout if they can get to a very specific gym, at a very specific time of day, and do a very specific type of training? If you are, then this tip is for you!
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Leave the gym behind! Are you one of those people who will only workout if they can get to a very specific gym, at a very specific time of day, and do a very specific type of training? If you are, then this tip is for you!

item.title: Fitness Destinations Fitness Tip - January 20, 2006
item.description: Today's Fitness Tip isn't so much a tip as it is a fact that should motivate you to get off your butt and go exercise!
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Today's Fitness Tip isn't so much a tip as it is a fact that should motivate you to get off your butt and go exercise!

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 19, 2006
item.description: Always practice perfect form! Whenever you are exercising, there is a very specific way to do each and every exercise. Do things right to maximize results, and minimize injury!
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Always practice perfect form! Whenever you are exercising, there is a very specific way to do each and every exercise. Do things right to maximize results, and minimize injury!

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 18, 2006
item.description: Practice "HIIT", the acronym for High Intensity Interval Training to get more out of your cardiovascular training, but in less time!
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Practice "HIIT", the acronym for High Intensity Interval Training to get more out of your cardiovascular training, but in less time!

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 17, 2006
item.description: Breathe hard! Or, get your heart rate up - however you want to phrase it! The point is that no serious, long-term fitness progress ever came out of "taking a stroll" on the treadmill, or by meandering around your neighborhood after dinner.
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Breathe hard! Or, get your heart rate up - however you want to phrase it! The point is that no serious, long-term fitness progress ever came out of "taking a stroll" on the treadmill, or by meandering around your neighborhood after dinner.

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 16, 2006
item.description: Get out and PLAY! People are so hung up on the "latest exercise programs" that they forget that the mission is to simply expend energy. No one ever said that you had to expend energy in the gym, or even by pounding the pavement in your own neighborhood.
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Get out and PLAY! People are so hung up on the "latest exercise programs" that they forget that the mission is to simply expend energy. No one ever said that you had to expend energy in the gym, or even by pounding the pavement in your own neighborhood.

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 13, 2006
item.description: A picture speaks a thousand words, and that is a very true statement when it comes to fitness! Having a motivating picture of yourself can literally mean the difference between success and failure in your weight loss endeavors.
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: A picture speaks a thousand words, and that is a very true statement when it comes to fitness! Having a motivating picture of yourself can literally mean the difference between success and failure in your weight loss endeavors.

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 12, 2006
item.description: Set and measure your goals! If you don't know specifically where you want to go, how can you possibly know if you are on the right track to get there?
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Set and measure your goals! If you don't know specifically where you want to go, how can you possibly know if you are on the right track to get there?

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 11, 2006
item.description: Would you believe that Watching TV is today's sound fitness advice?? Don't get too comfy on that couch, though! The type of TV that we are talking about is the interactive version now available through several different video game and software development companies.
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Would you believe that Watching TV is today's sound fitness advice?? Don't get too comfy on that couch, though! The type of TV that we are talking about is the interactive version now available through several different video game and software development companies.

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 10, 2006
item.description: RUN! As many people will agree, running is one of the most effective forms of cardiovascular training. Although the intensity of cardiovascular training can be improved no matter which form of training you choose, the effectiveness of an activity begs two questions: 1) Is the activity safe? 2) Does the activity help you in your weight loss or fitness goals?
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: RUN! As many people will agree, running is one of the most effective forms of cardiovascular training. Although the intensity of cardiovascular training can be improved no matter which form of training you choose, the effectiveness of an activity begs two questions: 1) Is the activity safe? 2) Does the activity help you in your weight loss or fitness goals?

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 9, 2006
item.description: Snack Time! Although "having a snack" is something that most of us equate with our early years of school, it turns out that after all this time, having a snack was and still is a GREAT idea!
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Snack Time! Although "having a snack" is something that most of us equate with our early years of school, it turns out that after all this time, having a snack was and still is a GREAT idea!

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 6, 2006
item.description: Read! In today's world of Information Overload, it is often easy to forget that one of the easiest and most effective ways to learn is to simply read a book!
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Read! In today's world of Information Overload, it is often easy to forget that one of the easiest and most effective ways to learn is to simply read a book!

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 5, 2006
item.description: Stress causes us to store bodyfat - Vent your frustrations! Learn about how stress effects your health, and get 2 great resources for helping you deal with it.
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Stress causes us to store bodyfat - Vent your frustrations! Learn about how stress effects your health, and get 2 great resources for helping you deal with it.

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 4, 2006
item.description: Here is a surprise tip for you - Become Unstable! It is hardly what we are advised to do in day to day life, but when it comes to exercise, being unstable is exactly what the doctor ordered.
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: Here is a surprise tip for you - Become Unstable! It is hardly what we are advised to do in day to day life, but when it comes to exercise, being unstable is exactly what the doctor ordered.

item.title: Fitness Destinations Daily Fitness Tip - January 3, 2006
item.description: The long-lost secret to losing weight and being healthy is about to be revealed - it may surprise you!
item.itunes:author: Aaron M. Potts
item.itunes:summary: The long-lost secret to losing weight and being healthy is about to be revealed - it may surprise you!
